hints.content:
To find how much ribbon $\purpleD{\text{Pilar}}$ has left, we need to subtract the amount of ribbon she gave to $\blueE{\text{Nico}}$.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/b330486ab3da0201bc4d5278adc0cc9e0c31a9f6)

$\purpleD{85}\text{ inches} - \blueE{19}\text{ inches}  = \maroonD{\square}\text{ inches} $

Let's subtract to find the difference.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/f2fe133ed93daf25da9cbc59f7497f3d6b464a02)

$\purpleD{85}\text{ inches}  - \blueE{19}\text{ inches}  = \maroonD{66}\text{ inches}$
Pilar has $\maroonD{66} \text{ in}$ of ribbon left.

question.content:
Pilar has $85$ inches of ribbon. She gives her friend, Nico, $19$ inches of the ribbon.

**How much ribbon does Pilar have left?**  

[[â˜ƒ numeric-input 1]] $\text{inches}$
